name: Baked Brie with Caramelized Onions and Hazelnuts
author: Fuller House
summary: This melty Brie recipe makes an easy party appetizer. If you like, you can switch up the toppings and try flavors such as cranberries or pistachio nuts.
ingredients: ¼ cup chopped hazelnuts or pecans
directions: In a small covered saucepan, cook onion in hot butter over low heat for 10 to 15 minutes or until tender and golden, stirring occasionally
Place Brie on an ovenproof plate or baking sheet
Spread the apricot preserves on top
Top with the onions and sprinkle with nuts
Bake for 15 to 20 minutes or until cheese is softened
If baked on a baking sheet, carefully transfer warm Brie to a serving platter
Serve with French bread slices and/or sliced fruit
